thread.section_title: Go-Optic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Go-Optic | www.go-optic.com
thread.title: Kyle Davis

author: Kyle Davis
title: Kyle Davis
text: Ordered frames on Friday. Simple e-commerce transaction. Now Monday, order is still "pending," and no one is available on Live Chat, have been waiting for someone on phone for 20 minutes. I'm pretty sure they don't actually have the frames their website allowed me to order because the frames aren't available anywhere else. In the meantime my daughter is waiting for replacement amblyopia correction glasses and my order is hung in the morass of some poorly run company. Take your business elsewhere.
